name: Heartblade
description: A corruption has spread and blinded the main source of life and love. Your task as the last survivor of his apprentices is to cure him. In his anger the main Heart is throwing knifes needles and chains at your way. Help him see past his Hatred by dodging his attacks. Do that using W, A, S, D. Pass his four stages of revenge, and be vigilant of his attacks as the knifes and needles will damage you. What's more the chains will slow you that will make dodging even harder.
